decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to quickly get powerful creatures into the graveyard using cards like Entomb and Grief, and then bring them back onto the battlefield using Reanimate and Animate Dead. The deck also utilizes disruptive spells like Daze and Force of Will to protect the combo. Additionally, it includes powerful creatures such as Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier to quickly close out the game. Wasteland and land disruption can also be used to slow down opponents while building towards the combo.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to quickly deploy aggressive creatures like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Amped Raptor, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Containment Priest and Static Prison. The deck focuses on maximizing early game pressure with efficient creatures and burn spells like Galvanic Discharge, while also having some control elements with cards like Delayed Blast Fireball and Swords to Plowshares. Additionally, the deck utilizes land disruption with cards like Wasteland and utility lands like Karakas to gain an advantage over opponents.

The main focus of this mono black aggro Legacy deck is to disrupt your opponent's hand and graveyard while applying pressure with efficient creatures. By using cards like Grief and Thoughtseize to strip away your opponent's resources, along with disruption spells like Fatal Push and Reanimate, you can keep your opponent on the back foot. Additionally, cards like Dauthi Voidwalker and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse provide strong threats that can quickly close out the game. With a mix of disruption, aggression, and powerful threats, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure a quick victory.

The deck focuses on aggressive plays with Eldrazi creatures, using mana acceleration from cards like Ancient Tomb and Lotus Petal to quickly cast powerful threats like It That Heralds the End and Thought-Knot Seer. The deck also includes cards like Eldrazi Temple and Eye of Ugin to further support the Eldrazi theme. Wasteland is included to disrupt the opponent's mana base, while Cavern of Souls ensures that Eldrazi spells can't be countered. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast, efficient Eldrazi creatures and disruptive land destruction.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with Cloudpost and other lands, utilizing cards like Crop Rotation and Candelabra of Tawnos to accelerate. It aims to disrupt opponent's strategies with cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Sowing Mycospawn, while also utilizing combo pieces like The One Ring and Emrakul, the Aeons Torn to close out the game quickly. The deck also incorporates powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger and Kozilek's Command to further dominate the board. Overall, the key concept is to ramp up mana quickly and overwhelm opponents with powerful threats.

The focal point of this deck is to quickly disrupt the opponent's mana base and lock them out of playing spells effectively using cards like Blood Moon, Magus of the Moon, and Sundering Eruption. The deck aims to cast powerful threats like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Broadside Bombardiers to quickly close out the game before the opponent can recover. With a strong aggro strategy that capitalizes on the opponent's inability to cast spells, this Dragon Stompy deck aims to control the game and secure victories with its efficient and aggressive plays.
